intro: Psychotria pandoana, commonly known as the "Pandoan Psychotria," is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly in countries like Colombia and Ecuador. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests. Psychotria pandoana is also noted for its potential medicinal properties, though further research is needed to confirm its therapeutic uses.
